name: Bouncy Platformer
description:
Use Arrow keys or ASDW to move the blue box around, and use the blue box to move one of the balls to the pink box (any one of the balls will do).

(The arrows will scroll the whole page if the cursor isn't clicked in the field of play)

This was for testing out a game mechanic, but it ended up kind of fun, and more challenging than expected. Hint: try approaching it like a warped version of Pool.

Software: Unity 2020.3

The background Grass texture is from Textures.com
